failure_code.description: The failure code for a failed payout.

statement_description.description: The description that will appear on the bank statement.

amount.description: The amount of the payout in the smallest currency unit.

balance_transaction.description: The ID of the balance transaction that describes the impact on your account balance.

created.description: The date the payout was created.

updated.description: The date the payout was last updated.

amount_reversed.description: The amount that was reversed (negative) from this payout.

source_type.description: The type of the source transaction (charge, payment, refund).

bank_account.description: Details of the bank account associated with the payout

metadata.description: Additional data about the bank account.

routing_number.description: The routing number of the bank account.

account_holder_type.description: The type of account holder (individual or company).

name.description: The name of the bank account.

id.description: The ID of the bank account.

last4.description: The last 4 digits of the bank account number.

fingerprint.description: A unique identifier for the bank account.

account_holder_name.description: The name of the account holder.

object.description: Type of object that represents the bank account.

status.description: The status of the bank account (verified, unverified).

currency.description: The currency of the bank account.

country.description: The country code of the bank account.

date.description: The date when the payout was initiated.

method.description: The method used for the payout (standard, instant).

livemode.description: Indicates if the payout was created in live mode.

statement_descriptor.description: The statement descriptor that appears on the recipient's bank statement.

failure_message.description: The failure message for a failed payout.

failure_balance_transaction.description: The ID of the balance transaction when the payout failed.

recipient.description: The recipient of the funds for the payout.

destination.description: The destination of the payout (e.g., bank account).

automatic.description: Indicates if the payout was done automatically by Stripe.

object.description: Type of object that represents the payout.

status.description: The status of the payout (paid, pending, failed).

transfer_group.description: A unique identifier for the transfer group.

type.description: The type of the payout (bank_account, card).

arrival_date.description: The date the payout is expected to arrive in the bank account.

source_transaction.description: The ID of the transaction that generated the payout.

original_payout.description: The original payout that was reversed.

reconciliation_status.description: The reconciliation status of the payout.

source_balance.description: The balance amount from which the payout was sourced.

reversed_by.description: The ID of the payout that initiated the reversal.
